sub_title: ICT Manager Cloud, Infrastructure and .NET development
summary:
People-oriented IT manager with 30 years of professional experience in IT infrastructure and software development. I have successfully set up IT departments, designed and implemented Transport Management Systems and numerous other IT projects. 

Challenge me, because I need to be able to build, transform or implement, I thrive best during change processes. My ambition is to get things done and make people smile, whether it is an restructuring an IT organization, implement an Azure infrastructure or manage a software development project.

projects.title: Replace ERP - FPS Famous Pacific Shipping
projects.description:
Famous Pacific Shipping in Rotterdam was operating on legacy software. However the orginization was touching the limits of this software. In my role as project manager I monitor progress and quality of the project. The solutions we develop are divided into small projects that interface with the current database(s). This way we are able to add new functionalities without endangering production.
During the project we create well designed and documented solutions with documents like: Use Case Model, Use Case, Use Case Realization, Application design, Business Object Model, Technical Data Model, Glossary and User Interface Design.
Within 2 years we reduced operational costs, by saving FTE's while improving quality. We managed to do more business with the same equivalent of staff, reducing phone calls, reducing customer complaints  and accomplish to communicate accurate information in time to our customers.

contributors.headline: ICT Manager Cloud, Infrastructure and .NET development
Owner AZA Solutions BV, Senior Software Engineer at AXPRO BV
CEO and Founder at AAS Logistics (Vietnam) LLC

projects.title: Automatisering HITS Service Nederland B.V.
projects.description:
HITS Service Nederland B.V. is een kleine organisatie, waarbij de gehele operatie nog wordt gevoerd middels papieren lijsten en Excel sheets. De wens is echter om het productieproces te automatiseren en planning vanaf iedere plek te kunnen uitvoeren en inzien. 

In eerste instantie is er middels interviews een beschrijving gemaakt van het huidige productie proces. 
Dit is vervolgens vertaald naar een IT oplossing. Hierbij is gekozen voor een oplossing in de cloud op basis van virtuele desktops en MS Access 2013. Gezien de verschillende locaties waar werkzaamheden worden uitgevoerd en de omvang van de organisatie is het logische om voor virtuele desktops in combinatie met MS Access te kiezen.

Na akkoord is een functiepunten analyse uitgevoerd en is er een begroting opgesteld. Op basis van de opgestelde oplossing is er binnen budget en binnen tijd en een systeem ontwikkeld, geïmplementeerd en succesvol opgeleverd.

contributors.headline: ICT Manager Cloud, Infrastructure and .NET development

projects.title: Automatisering PLQ
projects.description: PLQ is organisatie die landelijk opereert. De gehele operatie wordt gevoerd middels papieren lijsten, T-cards en Excel sheets. In dit proces zitten veel werkzaamheden die dubbel moeten worden uitgevoerd. De wens is om dit proces te optimaliseren en te automatiseren, zodat werkzaamheden en planning vanaf iedere plek kan worden uitgevoerd en kan worden ingezien.

projects.title: Replace ERP - TOP Trans Ocean Pacific
projects.description:
TOP Trans Ocean Pacific in Rotterdam was operating on legacy software. With the expansion of the customer base the need for a quick transition to an up-to-date platform was inevitably.

In my role as project manager I monitor progress and quality of the project. We managed to release main functionalities within two months and release all aspects in three months. The ERP empowers TOP to do more business with the same equivalent of staff and to communicate accurate information in time to our customers.

contributors.headline: ICT Manager Cloud, Infrastructure and .NET development

projects.title: Relocation of CETEM Containers
projects.description:
The relocation of CETEM containers was initiated soon after RMI made plans for the new head office. It was decided that CETEM containers - as a sister company - was moving to this same site. This involved the move of partial infrastructure and migration and integration into the RMI network and servers. To complete the infrastructure extra facilities were created for the Cargo Card enabeling the PortKey functionalities for this site.

We managed to move all PortKey hardware and all services like phone, email, EDI and internet in a weekend with no downtime. Planning and script writing payed off again.

Owner of !Bien and Linux Teacher at Techniek College Rotterdam
Innovation Manager at Secure Logistics BV

projects.title: Relocation of RMI Head Office
projects.description:
In 2012 RMI started the development of a new site in Rotterdam Botlek with plans to relocate the Head Office. This involved the move of the complete infrastructure existing of servers, clients, EDI, email, phones and faxes as well as the move of the main WAN hub for Europe.

With a preparation period of 4 months we managed to move all hardware, including servers and desktops and all services like phone, email and internet in a weekend with a minimum of downtime. planning and script writing payed off; the Monday after the move we had no issues worth mentioning and were all tickets closed before noon.

contributors.headline: ICT Manager Cloud, Infrastructure and .NET development
System Administrator / Data Analist at RHH Rotterdam Harbour Holding

profile_positions.title: ICT Manager

profile_positions.description: As an IT professional pur sang I love to connect business and IT, whether as Project Manager, Analyst or Business Consultant. I feel a project is a success when: primarily the people involved experience it as a succes and secondarily business requirements are met. In the end people are the key to success...
profile_positions.title: Project manager & consultant

profile_positions.description:
R.M.I. Global Logistic Services, RMI for short, is a logistics provider that specializes in the transport of bulk liquids in tank containers or Flexitanks. With offices around the world, I hold, with my team, the responsibility for the management of information and ICT infrastructure in North America, Europe and Asia.

Throughout my career with RMI I have, among other things, structured the ICT department, realized a global network infrastructure, Voice over IP and EDI Interfaces with suppliers and customers using MS BizTalk
profile_positions.title: Head of ICT

profile_positions.description:
Working in different IT environments in SMEs. Most  relations working on Microsoft environments. Linux was also used, mainly for Checkpoint Firewalls and Anti Spam solutions.

The system administration embraces primarily the control and troubleshooting in areas of Red Hat Linux (8, 9), Windows (NT, 2000, 2003), Citrix presentation server, backup, virus scanning and firewalls.
 
As Technical Consultant responsible for advising clients on security and administration issues.

Skills:
 • Microsoft Server environments,
 • Microsoft / Linux server applications such as SQL Server, Exchange, Checkpoint FW-1, Backup and Anti-Virus solutions.
 • TCP / IP
profile_positions.title: Senior System Administrator / Technical Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Leadership to a team of 8. Advising clients in infrastructural change processes: Planning the configuration, test environment and plan of action including roll-back scenarios. This in critical (Windows and Novell) environments.

Skills
• Project management
• Monitoring activities
 • Establishment of (system) management,
 • SLAs,
 • "Happy calls".
profile_positions.title: Executive / Consultant

profile_positions.description:
General manager and co-owner of an IT company with 12 employees, specializing in repair and maintenance of IT equipment and management of IT environments. These IT environments with up to 500 workstations, were both Microsoft and Novell based. Customers included companies like the town of Spijkenisse, the town of Brielle, 3M, Sharp and JVC.

I handeled two areas of expertise, one part operational planning and monitoring work progress The other area was accounting and financial reporting.

 Skills
 • Operational and Fiancial management
 • Yearplans,
 • Monitoring activities,
 • Establishment of (system) management,
 • SLAs,
 • "Happy calls ",
 • Budgets,
 • Liquidity Overviews,

 • Checking accounts,
 • Prepare year work.
